title: Sea bass, paprika potatoes with a chorizo, pimientos and basil salad
description: Delicious seabass fillets, lightly fried and served with peppery fried potatoes and a punchy caper dressing.
ingredients: 400g/14oz new potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes
200g/7oz pimientos peppers, chopped into bite-sized pieces
4 x sea bass fillets, scaled and pin-boned
